section:
When you create a new Mingle project from scratch, by default it has the following tabs already setup:
Overview - this is the home page or project dashboard. It's a Mingle page and is the first tab you see after you sign in
All - this lets you view all cards in Mingle. You can filter and sort by card properties and create favorites based on the results
History - this tab lets you see what's been happening in the project and lets you view changes for cards, pages and application source files
Project admin - this lets you manage project settings, including team members, project properties and favorites
Source - this lets you view the source repository, source versions and changes between source file versions (only visible if you have setup integration between Mingle and your team's source repository).
Dependencies - this lets you view the dependencies that your project has raised on others or dependencies that your project is resolving for others. (This is a Mingle Plus exlusive feature)
You can create additional tabs based on favorites or pages. If a favorite doesn't already exist you can create it first. You can then create a tab from Project admin Favorites & tabs.
